roleset.name: not restricted
roleset.note: Comparison with 'constrain.01'. Based on cryosphere data. Framed by Katie.

role.descr: Agent, entity allowing or causing unhindered action
secondary predication or action, unconstrained from X

example.name: theme
example.text: Police were able to illcit an unconstrained confession.

example.name: use arg 0 unless there is both an agent and an instrument.
example.text: Trading, unconstrained from growth by the upturn in the economy
example.arg: by the upturn in the economy
